summary: The tech classification encompasses a wide range of interdisciplinary resources and profiles that explore and innovate within the realm of technology. Articles in this category delve into the complex intersections of the internet, decentralization, and regenerative design, proposing revolutionary concepts like 'ecosystem architecture' to foster sustainable digital environments. Profiles highlight leaders in tech design and UX, offering insights into the forefront of technological advancements and thought leadership.
excerpt: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
